title: Trust Thomas & other stories
creator_contributor_role: Victorian Council for Children's Films and Television, distributor
subject_group: Literature/Children's literature - Film and video adaptations
description: Episode of Series "Thomas the tank engine and friends. - New series.". Nine new stories from Thomas and his friends based on the Railway Series by Rev. W. Awdry. 1."Henry's Forest" - Henry is very sad when a storm damages his favourite forest. 2."The Trouble with Mud" - Gordon gets splashed with mud. 3."No Joke for James" - James plays a trick on Gordon. 4."Thomas, Percy and the Post Train" - Thomas and Percy prove their worth pulling the post train. 5. "Trust Thomas" - Bertie learns that he can trust an engine. 6."Mavis" - Mavis, a young diesel, causes problems at the quarry. 7."Toby's Tightrope" - Mavis' high spirits put Toby in danger. 8."Edward, Trevor and the Really Useful Party" - Edward and Trevor may be old, but they are still really useful. 9."Buzz Buzz" - James boasts of bravery, till he meets a swarm of bees.
related_objects: Series; S01079; Thomas the tank engine and friends. - New series.; Active; 1991
